1255289001.name: Black

materialDetails.name: Polyester
materialDetails.description: Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.name: Recycled polyester
materialDetails.description: Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.

materialDetails.name: Spandex
materialDetails.description: Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from oil (a fossil resource).

1255289001.description: Biking shorts in functional fabric made with SoftMove™ for the ultimate in softness and comfort plus contouring support, and DryMove™ to wick away moisture from skin. High waist and wide waistband panel.

learnMore.linkText: Learn more about the materials in this product

preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsIntro: The total weight of this product contains at least
preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsExplanation: We exclude the weight of minor components such as, but not exclusively: threads, buttons, zippers, embellishments and prints.
preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsCalculation: The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that, we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets and multipacks, all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.
preferredMaterialsExplained.materialUsedExplanations: Explanations of the materials used in this product.

careGuide.linkText: Read about how you can make your clothes last longer

deliveryDetails.deliveryAdditionalInfo: Returns by mail incur a fee of $3.99. In-store returns are free.
